connector.description:
Send data to Kafka topics on an insecure broker.

The Kamelet is able to understand the following headers to be set:

- `key` / `ce-key`: as message key

- `partition-key` / `ce-partitionkey`: as message partition key

Both the headers are optional.

Three headers, if specified, will be deduplicated with different names, kafka.key will be duplicated into kafka.KEY, kafka.topic into kafka.TOPIC and kafka.override_topic into kafka.OVERRIDE_TOPIC

camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.top.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.top.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.boo.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.boo.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs
